insights.title: Improve Type Hint Coverage
insights.description: Found 75834 functions without return type hints. Type hints improve code readability and help catch errors early.
insights.implementation_notes: Add return type hints to functions, starting with public APIs

insights.title: Improve Exception Handling
insights.description: Found 112 bare except clauses. Specific exception handling makes debugging easier.
insights.implementation_notes: Replace bare except with specific exception types

insights.title: Review Security Practices
insights.description: Found 2 potential security issues. Hardcoded credentials pose significant risks.
insights.implementation_notes: Move all secrets to environment variables or secure config files

insights.title: Replace Print Statements with Logging
insights.description: Found 3054 print statements. Proper logging provides better control over output.
insights.implementation_notes: Replace print() with logger.info(), logger.debug(), etc.

insights.title: Consider Code Refactoring
insights.description: Multiple files have long lines, suggesting complex functions that could be refactored.
insights.implementation_notes: Break down large functions into smaller, focused functions
